price: ߞߏ߫ ߌ ߢߊߘߐߟߊ ߟߐ߬ ߘߌ߯ߣߊ ߘߐ߫ ߖߐ߲ߖߐ߲߫ ߸ ߌ ߞߊߣߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ߜߙߊ߬ߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߝߋ߲߫ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬ ( ߞߊ߬ ߒ ߟߐ߬)
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-an aqim wajhaka lilddīni ḥanīfan walā takūnanna mina al-mush'rikīna
